title: TotalReminder 6.3
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $9.60 Giveaway of the day — TotalReminder 6.3 A single place to keep contacts, events, passwords, logs and more. User rating: 2 (100%) 0 (0%) Leave a comment 
TotalReminder 6.3 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now TotalReminder 6.3 Terms and conditions 
TotalReminder gives you a single place to keep contacts, events, passwords, logs, schedule application launch or regular web page visits - all these in a user friendly, resource efficient application. The program has a lot of import/export and synchronization options for various formats and providers. TotalReminder also contains some useful tools: stopwatch, countdown timer, date-time calculator, name-days manager, sunrise-sunset (and some additional) information for a huge number of locations around the globe, idle processing, password generator and a powerful communicator (via emails, prints or pdf files) as a packed in standalone program.   
Windows Vista SP2/7 SP1 (x86 and x64)/ 8 (x86 and x64)/ 8.1 (x86 and x64)/ 10 (x86 and x64) Publisher:
